import numpy as np # linear algebra

source.588d05c3:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
import plotly.express as px
source.f56f5dbb:
agegrp=data.groupby('stroke')['age'].mean().reset_index()
fig = px.bar(agegrp, y="age", x="stroke",color='stroke', log_y=False)
fig.update_layout(title='Average age of patients got stroke vs not got stroke')
fig.show()
source.48885eec:
agemed=data.groupby('stroke')['age'].median().reset_index()
fig = px.bar(agemed, y="age", x="stroke",color='stroke', log_y=False)
fig.update_layout(title='Median age of patients got stroke vs not got stroke')
fig.show()
source.3f0486cd:
restgrp=dfst['Residence_type'].value_counts().reset_index()

fig = px.pie(restgrp, values="Residence_type", names="index",template="seaborn")

fig.update_traces(rotation=90, pull=0.05, textinfo="percent+label")
fig.show()

gendergrp

fig.show()

source.aab64188:
glucosegrp=data.groupby(['stroke'])['avg_glucose_level'].mean().reset_index()
fig = px.bar(glucosegrp, y="avg_glucose_level", x="stroke",color='stroke', log_y=False,template='ggplot2')
fig.update_layout(title='Average age of stroke patients by glucose level')
fig.show()
source.d222a1e6:
standglu=data.groupby(['stroke'])['avg_glucose_level'].median().reset_index()
fig = px.bar(standglu, y="avg_glucose_level", x="stroke",color='stroke', log_y=False)
fig.update_layout(title='Median age of stroke patients by glucose level')
fig.show()
source.101da4cb:
minavgglu=data.groupby(['stroke'])['avg_glucose_level'].max().reset_index()
fig = px.bar(minavgglu, y="avg_glucose_level", x="stroke",color='stroke', log_y=False,template='ggplot2')
fig.update_layout(title='Maximum glucose level at which stroke is recorded')
fig.show()
source.eb656492:
maxavgglu=data.groupby(['stroke'])['avg_glucose_level'].min().reset_index()
fig = px.bar(maxavgglu, y="avg_glucose_level", x="stroke",color='stroke', log_y=False,template='ggplot2')
fig.update_layout(title='Minimum glucose level at which stroke is recorded')
fig.show()
source.c3f8ba80:
grp1=dfst[dfst['gender']=='Female'].groupby('age_segment')['stroke'].count().reset_index()
grp1 = grp1.sort_values('stroke', ascending=False).reset_index()
grp1.drop('index', axis=1, inplace=True)
fig = px.pie(grp1, values="stroke", names="age_segment",template="seaborn")

fig.update_traces(rotation=90, pull=0.05, textinfo="percent+label")
fig.show()
source.615a6909:
grp2=dfst[dfst['gender']=='Male'].groupby('age_segment')['stroke'].count().reset_index()
grp2 = grp2.sort_values('stroke', ascending=False).reset_index()
grp2.drop('index', axis=1, inplace=True)

fig = px.pie(grp2, values="stroke", names="age_segment",template="seaborn")

fig.update_traces(rotation=90, pull=0.05, textinfo="percent+label")
fig.show()
